description:
Represents the user's purchase intent.

These are the initial fields utilized in the human-present flow. For
human-not-present flows, additional fields will be added to this mandate.

user_cart_confirmation_required.description: If false, the agent can make purchases on the user's behalf once all purchase conditions have been satisfied. This must be true if the intent mandate is not signed by the user.
user_cart_confirmation_required.title: User Cart Confirmation Required

natural_language_description.description: The natural language description of the user's intent. This is generated by the shopping agent, and confirmed by the user. The goal is to have informed consent by the user.
natural_language_description.example: High top, old school, red basketball shoes
natural_language_description.title: Natural Language Description

merchants.description: Merchants allowed to fulfill the intent. If not set, the shopping agent is able to work with any suitable merchant.
merchants.title: Merchants

skus.description: A list of specific product SKUs. If not set, any SKU is allowed.
skus.title: Skus

requires_refundability.description: If true, items must be refundable.
requires_refundability.title: Requires Refundability

intent_expiry.description: When the intent mandate expires, in ISO 8601 format.
intent_expiry.title: Intent Expiry

title: IntentMandate
